name: MUSTSensorDriver
description: Plugin for processing MUST Sensor Data.

messageTypes.description: Generic message for detection from Sensor.

configuration.description: The log level for this plugin

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provides, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.

Projection string for projecting cartesian detection data into WSG84 coordinates.
Variance of the reported positon data coming from the sensor. Value is used for cooperative perception messages that enable sensor fusion like the SDMS.
Variance of the reported velocity data coming from the sensor. Value is used for cooperative perception messages that enable sensor fusion like the SDMS.
